summary: Solo Leveling-inspired life progression system with AI-powered personalized task generation that analyzes user physical capabilities and habits to create adaptive daily quests with progressive difficulty scaling, featuring voice-activated interface for tracking tasks, habits, skills, and goals through gamified XP/leveling mechanics
architectural_notes: Use browser Web Speech API for voice recognition (optimized for Chrome/Edge)
Store conversation history and user progress data locally
Design gamification mechanics with XP calculation algorithms
Create responsive mobile-first UI with gamified visual elements
Implement AI task generation algorithm that analyzes user profile data (physical capabilities, fitness level, health conditions, habits)
Design progressive difficulty scaling system based on completion history, current level, and stat improvements
Create user profile onboarding questionnaire for initial data collection
Build task recommendation engine that generates personalized daily quests automatically
known_issues: Voice recognition works best in Chrome/Edge browsers; limited support in Safari/Firefox
No true AI learning capability; system relies on stored patterns and user data
Web app only, not native Android APK
AI task generation is pattern-based, not true machine learning; uses rule-based algorithms to personalize tasks

existing_features.title: Implement Web Speech API integration for voice recognition allowing users to speak commands to log activities and confirm task completions
Implement text-to-speech voice feedback system that verbally responds to user actions, confirms task completions, and announces level-ups and achievements
Design main dashboard displaying user stats, current level, XP progress bar, active quests, and recent achievements in a Solo Leveling-inspired visual style
Create task management interface where users can view all tasks by category, add new tasks by voice or text, and mark tasks complete with visual and voice confirmation
Build progress visualization screens showing stat growth over time, level progression history, and achievement progress with charts and graphs
Ensure entire application is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices with touch-friendly controls and voice-first interaction patterns

Apply a cohesive visual design inspired by Solo Leveling aesthetics featuring a dark theme with glowing accents, RPG-style stat displays, and dramatic progression animations for level-ups and achievements
Implement user profile system with character stats including Strength, Intelligence, Discipline, and other relevant attributes that increase based on completed activities
Create XP and leveling system where users gain experience points from completing tasks and level up when thresholds are reached
Build task management system supporting multiple categories: daily tasks, habits, skills, and goals with different XP values and progression tracking
Implement daily quest system that generates new quests based on user level and unlocks more challenging quests as user progresses
Create achievement and milestone system that unlocks new challenges and rewards as users reach specific levels or complete certain task combinations

Create user profile setup interface with questionnaire capturing physical capabilities (fitness level, mobility, endurance), health conditions (injuries, limitations, chronic conditions), current habits (sleep schedule, exercise frequency, work schedule), and lifestyle preferences
Create automatic daily quest generation that converts AI-generated tasks into mandatory daily quests in the user's quest log each day
Integrate AI-generated quests with existing voice control system allowing users to complete AI quests via voice commands
Display user profile summary and AI personalization status on dashboard showing current fitness level, active limitations, and next difficulty progression milestone

Progressive difficulty scaling that automatically increases task challenge based on user progress and stat improvements
Automatic conversion of AI-generated tasks into mandatory daily quests
Implement backend data model for storing user profile information including physical capabilities, health conditions, habits, and preferences with persistent storage

Implement progressive difficulty scaling system that tracks user completion history, current level, and stat improvements to automatically increase task challenge over time
